seniority_level.evidence: Job requires minimum 4+ years of Big Data experience and 3 years on Azure, which aligns with a mid‑level data engineer.

job_family.evidence: Title is "Data Engineer" and responsibilities focus on building and maintaining data pipelines.

sub_specialty.evidence: Mentions building streaming pipelines, Kafka, and real‑time processing alongside batch ingestion.

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of people‑management responsibilities or direct reports; role is purely technical.

primary_cloud.evidence: Responsibilities list Azure services (DataBricks, HDInsight, Data Factory, Synapse, SQL Server) and Azure Cloud Data Platform repeatedly.

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud providers are explicitly mentioned in the posting.

processing_paradigm.evidence: Job describes pipelines for files, streams, and databases, indicating both batch and streaming workloads.

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tools (Airflow, Luigi, Dagster, etc.) are referenced.

storage_layer.evidence: References to HDFS, NoSQL databases, Hive, and Azure Data Lake storage imply a data‑lake focus.

remote_restriction.evidence: Location is Bengaluru, India and geo restriction type is "specific_countries" with allowed country IN.

timezone_focus.evidence: Job is tied to an Indian location; no broader timezone requirement is stated.

relocation_required.evidence: Posting does not mention relocation assistance or a requirement to move.

h1b_friendly.evidence: Visa sponsorship is listed as "not_mentioned" in the extraction.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No reference to OPT/CPT eligibility; work authorization is implied for local candidates.

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship clause; only location restriction suggests any candidate authorized to work in India is acceptable.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Typical IBM full‑time roles are employee (W2) positions; no contract or C2C language appears.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Posting does not discuss career ladders, promotion tracks, or growth opportunities.

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship or coaching programs are referenced.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No language about promotions or advancement paths appears in the posting.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers or lateral moves.

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career track options (IC, management, specialist, architect) are described.

requirement_strictness.evidence: A clear set of must‑have technical skills is listed with only one nice‑to‑have skill (Kafka).

scope_definition.evidence: Job description is focused specifically on data‑engineering responsibilities without mixing other roles.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Required skill set aligns with a mid‑level data engineer having 4+ years experience; no unrealistic senior‑level expectations.
